price: 107. And for those whose faces will become white, they will be in Allâh’s Mercy (Paradise), therein they shall dwell forever.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبۡيَضَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فَفِي رَحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
